message.entry: 求解器无法创建 UMFPACK 符号数据。
求解器无法创建 UMFPACK 符号数据。
Solver could not solve the iteration matrix. Iteration matrix may be singular.
由于遇到奇异迭代矩阵，求解器无法求解代数方程组。请考虑提供更准确的初始条件。如果问题仍然存在，请检查模型结构和参数值。

Solver could not solve the system of algebraic equations because a singular iteration matrix was encountered. Consider reducing the fixed step size and/or providing more accurate initial conditions. If the problem persists, check the model structure and values of parameters.
An error occurred while computing the eigen values for stiffness calculation by auto solver : {0}.
执行稀疏 mxArray 运算时，内存分配失败/出错

Unable to construct analytical Jacobian matrix because required size exceeds the specified maximum array size limit {0}GB ({1}% of total RAM). <actions exclusiveFixIts="no"> <action type="fixit"> <cmd>set_param(gcs,''SolverJacobianMethodControl'',''SparsePerturbation'');</cmd> <txt>Change the ''Solver Jacobian Method'' parameter value to ''Sparse Perturbation''. </txt> </action> <action type="suggestion"> <txt>Adjust the maximum array size in the Workspace section of the MATLAB Preferences. </txt> </action> </actions>
